verses.verse: And it shall be<WH935>, when you are come in unto the land<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you for an inheritance<WH5159>, and possessest<WH3423> it<WH3427>, and dwell in it;

That you shall take<WH3947> of the first<WH7225> of all the fruit<WH6529> of the earth<WH127>, which you shall bring<WH935> of your land<WH776> that the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you<WH7760>, and shall put it in a basket<WH2935>, and shall go<WH1980> unto the place<WH4725> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name there<WH8034>.

And you shall go<WH935> unto the priest<WH3548> that shall be in those days<WH3117>, and say<WH559> unto him<WH5046>, I profess this day<WH3117> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, that I am come<WH935> unto the country<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto our fathers<WH1> for to give us<WH5414>.
And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> the basket<WH2935> out of your hand<WH3027>, and set it down<WH3240> before<WH6440> the altar<WH4196> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>.

And you shall speak<WH6030> and say<WH559> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, A Syrian<WH761> ready to perish<WH6> was my father<WH1>, and he went down<WH3381> into Egypt<WH4714>, and stayed<WH1481> there with<WH4962> a few<WH4592>, and became there a nation<WH1471>, great<WH1419>, mighty<WH6099>, and populous<WH7227>:
And the Egyptians<WH4713> evilly dealt<WH7489> us<WH6031>, and afflicted us<WH5414>, and laid upon us hard<WH7186> bondage<WH5656>:

And when we cried<WH6817> unto the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of our fathers<WH1>, the Lord<WH3068> heard<WH8085> our voice<WH6963>, and looked<WH7200> on our affliction<WH6040>, and our labor<WH5999>, and our oppression<WH3906>:

And the Lord<WH3068> brought us forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and with an outstretched<WH5186> arm<WH2220>, and with great<WH1419> terribleness<WH4172>, and with signs<WH226>, and with wonders<WH4159>:
And he has brought<WH935> us into this place<WH4725>, and has given<WH5414> us this land<WH776>, even a land<WH776> that flows<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>.

And now<WH935>, behold, I have brought the firstfruits<WH6529> of the land<WH127>, which you<WH3068>, O Lord, have given<WH5414> me<WH3240>. And you shall set it before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and worship<WH7812> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>:

And you shall rejoice<WH8055> in every good<WH2896> thing which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given<WH5414> unto you<WH1004>, and unto your house, you<WH3881>, and the Levite, and the stranger<WH1616> that is among you<WH7130>.

When you have made an end<WH3615> of tithing<WH6237> all the tithes<WH4643> of your increase<WH8393> the third<WH7992> year<WH8141>, which is the year<WH8141> of tithing<WH4643>, and have given<WH5414> it unto the Levite<WH3881>, the stranger<WH1616>, the fatherless<WH3490>, and the widow<WH490>, that they may eat<WH398> inside your gates<WH8179>, and be filled<WH7646>;

Then you shall say<WH559> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, I have brought away<WH1197> the hallowed things<WH6944> out of my house<WH1004>, and also have given<WH5414> them unto the Levite<WH3881>, and unto the stranger<WH1616>, to the fatherless<WH3490>, and to the widow<WH490>, according to all your commandments<WH4687> which you have commanded<WH6680> me<WH5674>: I have not transgressed your commandments<WH4687>, neither have I forgotten them<WH7911>:

I have not eaten<WH398> there in my mourning<WH205>, neither have I taken away<WH1197> anything there for any unclean<WH2931> use<WH5414>, nor given anything there for the dead<WH4191>: but I have listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of the Lord<WH3068> my God<WH430>, and have done<WH6213> according to all that you have commanded me<WH6680>.

Look down<WH8259> from your holy<WH6944> habitation<WH4583>, from heaven<WH8064>, and bless<WH1288> your people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>, and the land<WH127> which you have given<WH5414> us<WH7650>, as you swore unto our fathers<WH1>, a land<WH776> that flows<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>.

This day<WH3117> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has commanded<WH6680> you to do<WH6213> these statutes<WH2706> and judgments<WH4941>: you shall therefore keep<WH8104> and do<WH6213> them with all your heart<WH3824>, and with all your soul<WH5315>.

You have declared<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> this day<WH3117> to be your God<WH430>, and to walk<WH3212> in his ways<WH1870>, and to keep<WH8104> his statutes<WH2706>, and his commandments<WH4687>, and his judgments<WH4941>, and to listen<WH8085> unto his voice<WH6963>:
And the Lord<WH3068> has declared<WH559> you this day<WH3117> to be his peculiar<WH5459> people<WH5971>, as he has promised<WH1696> you<WH8104>, and that you should keep all his commandments<WH4687>;

And to make<WH5414> you high<WH5945> above all nations<WH1471> which he has made<WH6213>, in praise<WH8416>, and in name<WH8034>, and in honor<WH8597>; and that you may be a holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, as he has spoken<WH1696>.
